summary: The contact owns a 2022 Coach House Platinum XL. The contact stated while driving at various speeds, the warning message "Service Advance Tract" appeared on the instrument panel and the ABS, the pre-collision assist, lane assist, and ABS warning lights would illuminate intermittently. The manufacturer was notified of the failure and assisted the contact with locating a dealer who could reprogram the ABS. The vehicle was taken to the dealer who test drove the vehicle and diagnosed that the left front wheel speed sensor needed to be replaced. The contact stated the vehicle was repaired.  The approximate failure mileage was 2,700.
